original_text: The prince is to enter from the outside through the portico of the gateway and stand by the gatepost. The priests are to sacrifice his burnt offering and his fellowship offerings. He is to bow down in worship at the threshold of the gateway and then go out, but the gate will not be shut until evening.
korean_text: 군주는 바깥 문 현관을 통하여 들어와서 문 벽 곁에 서고 제사장은 그를 위하여 번제와 감사제를 드릴 것이요 군주는 문 통로에서 예배한 후에 밖으로 나가고 그 문은 저녁까지 닫지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: The prince is to enter from the outside
through the portico of the gateway
The priests are to sacrifice his burnt offering

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 교제 제물도 바쳐야 한다

sentences.original_text: He is to bow down in worship
at the threshold of the gateway
but the gate will not be shut
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 문은 닫히지 않을 것이다
